column2: Strangely,  the  appellant had  no  injury  on his  person  after  this  sustained
appellant  had  watered  down  his  claim  of  "inhumane"  attack  by  stating
that he  did not suffer any injury after  the attack  as  he  was  not assaulted

column1: with any weapon. His claim of losing consciousness after a pistol attack on

column2: head therefore becomes only a figment.
